help you it is actually holding you back there's a cost associated with it there's
a legacy as well as complexity that's built up over the years instead of being
a challenge it should be the backbone it should help you move forward towards that
goal and not hold you back in order to turn technology from
a roadblock to an enabler we do three things First we simplify by
